column4: i cant get my ubuntu live usb to boot on my laptop, it just says boot error, but it works on my pc.
you might try change the bios settings in your laptop for boot on usb if it has boot from usb disk pick that
well if you tried every option of devices in bios you can look at installing plop boot manager
I'm not sure what you presently have installed but plop has many ways to install http://www.plop.at/en/bootmanager.html
